駁.definition: variegated; heterogeneous; to refute; to contradict; to ship by barge; a barge; a lighter (ship)

駁倒.definition: to refute; to demolish (an argument, theory etc)

駁回.definition: to reject; to turn down; to overrule

駁岸.definition: a low stone wall built along the water's edge to protect an embankment; revetment

駁斥.definition: to refute; to debunk; to deny; to denounce

駁落.definition: to peel off; mottled; to fail an exam; to be demoted

駁議.definition: to correct (in writing) sb's errors or misconceptions

駁面子.definition: to hurt sb's feelings by rebuffing their request
